nested-lists-grammar_key1: ## Using Grammar to create Nested Lists
nested-lists-grammar_key2: **Yeh thoda advanced concept hai. Iss par aap 4-5 ghante lagane ke baad bhi nahi samajh paa rahe, toh aap isse skip kar kar aage badh sakte hai**
nested-lists-grammar_key3: Jaise English mei `Grammar` hoti hai, aise hi hamare `code` ki bhi grammar hoti hai. Issi grammar ko use kar kar `compiler` samajhta hai, hamare `code` ka kya matlab hai, aur woh matlab samajh kar, machine yaai computer samjhata hai. Jis `language` mei `compiler` `machine` ko woh `code` samjhata hai, usse `machine `code`` kehte hai.
nested-lists-grammar_key4: Nested Lists ko grammar ko tarah se samajhte hai.
nested-lists-grammar_key9: Dariye mat, yeh bahut simple se rules hai. Yeh rules kehte hai ki, right side mei jo bhi `grammar rules` diye gaye hai woh rules ko use kar kar aap ek nayi `nested list` bana sakte hai.
nested-lists-grammar_key11:
`[5]` ek `nested list` hai using Rule 1
`[[5], 2]` ek `nested list` hai using Rule 2
`[3, [[5], 2]]` ek `nested list` hai using Rule 3
`[5, 6, 7]` ek `nested list` hai using Rule 4 (kyuki yeh `[5]`, `[6]`, `[7]` jo teen nested lists hai unko jod kar banayi jaa sakti hai)
nested-lists-grammar_key12: Aap dhyaan se dekhenge toh aap kisi bhi nested list ko inn rules mei break kar sakte hai. Ek example ke liye:
nested-lists-grammar_key13: Humein inn rules ko use kar kar ek recursion ka program likhna hai, jo ek random `nested list` generate karta hai.
nested-lists-grammar_key15: Aap ke paas chaar rules hai, aap chaar rules mei se koi bhi rule randomly use kar kar ek `nested list` generate kar sakte ho
nested-lists-grammar_key16: Har rule ke liye aapko batana padega aapki nayi list kaise hogi
nested-lists-grammar_key17: Aap ek generateRandomNumber naam ka function use kar sakte hai, `INTEGER` generate karne ke liye, aur
nested-lists-grammar_key18: Aap ek generateRandomNestedList naam ka function use kar sakte hai `NESTED_LIST` generate karne ke liye, yeh function recursive hoga
nested-lists-grammar_key21: Agar aap ko thoda aur samajhna ka mann hai, toh aap nested_list of `INTEGER` and `STRINGS` mix ke rules likh kar, usko generate karne ka cocde likh sakte hai.
nested-lists-grammar_key23: Agar aapko yeh exercise interesting lagi, aur aap yeh samajh paa rahe hai, toh aap Shakuntala Devi ka `code` samajh sakte hai. Woh issi logic ko use kar kar likha gaya hai.
